faire simple

  1. (informal) to keep it simple, to make it simple
    pour faire simple ― simply put, simply speaking, in a word; broadly speaking, not to go into detail
    pourquoi faire compliqué quand on peut faire simple ? ― why complicate matters? why make things more complicated than they need to be? why make your life difficult?
trans: to keep it simple, to make it simple

title: faire simple
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /fɛʁ sɛ̃pl/
